relationships.description: Dumbledore mentions that Voldemort has overcome a particular barrier.
Harry's blood makes Voldemort stronger, and Harry's mother left protection in him.
Dumbledore is questioning Harry about Voldemort.
Voldemort touched Harry's face without hurting himself.
